Talk1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>Hey! <sp:5:0:0>What kind of jerk splashes water on
somebody with no warning?!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Wait a sec...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseM_00>I-<sp:5:1:0>I got an idea!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>A flag! We can make a flag as a symbol
for the village!<sp:0:4:0>That'll help draw in visitors and liven up
the community!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Time to start working on the design!
Talk1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Really. I couldn't have dreamed up such
a great idea without your help.

Now, I think I'll go liven up Lurelin Village
with a new flag!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Here. <sp:5:0:0>It's the fabric I used for the flag.
Maybe you'll find some other use for it.
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Apologies. I'm so hungry, I suppose I'm
getting phantom smells...
Talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Aaah!<sp:5:0:0> This smell! This is the dish I've
been dreaming of!<sp:0:4:0>You made it for me? <sp:5:0:0>Thank you so much!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>And now...I eat!
Talk1011: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>A satisfactory job, if I do say so myself!<sp:0:4:0>Thanks!
Talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease_01>*sigh* So satisfying! At laaast, I can start
thinking of ways to draw in visitors.
Let's see...
Wait... Oh no...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hot! Hot!<sp:0:4:0>The Goron spice is burning me up! I can't
focus when my whole body's on fire!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>What do I do? I need a <clr:0000>gust of wind<clr:ffff> to
cool me down...
Talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ahhh... <sp:5:1:0>Much better! Now I'm nice
and cool!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Wait a sec...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseM_00>I-<sp:5:1:0>I got an idea!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>A flag! <sp:5:1:0>We can make a flag as a symbol
for the village!<sp:0:4:0>That'll help draw in visitors and liven up
the community!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Time to start working on the design!
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>You! I heard what you did!<sp:0:4:0>Helping Bolson rebuild the village?
That's amazing. Truly.<sp:0:4:0>When I heard everyone talk about a hero
saving the village, I thought it might have
been you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you so much. I know my father,
Rozel, is grateful too.
Talk1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Somehow the spice from that dish is
still lingering.<sp:0:4:0>I'm burning up so much, I can't focus!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Maybe if there was a <clr:0000>gust of wind <clr:ffff>to
quench this heat...
Talk1014:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01><clr:ffff>If you go to <clr:0000>Hateno Village's dye shop<clr:ffff>
they can probably help with that.
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>I want to liven up the village somehow,
but I'm so hungry. I can't think of ideas...
only a delicious <clr:0000>meal <clr:ffff>I ate once.
The recipe called for Hylian rice,
Goron spice, and mighty porgy or
armored porgyâ€”<sp:5:0:0>either would work.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Ugh. Just thinking about it makes me so
very hungry...

<sp:3:0:2:0001><sp:0:2:2:6400>With a few forkfuls of that in my stomach,
I'd have the brainpower to come up with
an idea for livening up the village.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>But where am I going to find that <clr:0000>meal<clr:ffff>?
Not here, that's for sure. The ingredients
aren't easy to come by.
Talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>*slurp* *slurp* That spicy flavor, balanced
by a strong note of umami...<sp:0:4:0>It's just too delicious!
Talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>I heard about you.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>You're him, right? <sp:5:0:0>The person who helped
Bolson rebuild the village?<sp:0:4:0>Thank you so much! My father, Rozel,
speaks very highly of you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>You know, I was living with my husband
in Hateno Village until not too long ago.
Talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now, I'd like to do my part to help get
things going again in Lurelin Village.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>Problem is, I'm so hungry that I can't
think of ideas. Only food. Like one <clr:0000>meal<clr:ffff>
that I ate long ago...<sp:0:4:0>Hylian rice cooked with Goron spice
and porgy. Mmm!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Ugh... Thinking about it just makes me hungrier.


<sp:3:0:2:0001><sp:0:2:2:6400>With a few forkfuls of that in my stomach,
I'd have the brainpower to come up with
an idea for livening up the village.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_00>But where am I going to find that <clr:0000>meal<clr:ffff>?
Not here, that's for sure. The ingredients
aren't easy to come by.
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Overall, I'd say it's looking mostly as it
did before.<sp:0:4:0>I was born and raised here, so I really
appreciate all you've done for this village.
Talk1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When we heard those monsters occupying
the village were driven out, we decided to
come and look around for ourselves.
